span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: APS offers at-home learning content to make it easy for our students to find the age-appropriate materials they need. We are also providing recommendations and access to books to read or borrow

a.title: HAC
a.span: Akron Public Schools uses an online system, eSchoolPlus Home Access Center (HAC), to provide a wealth of information for parents about their child(ren).

a.title: Enrolling Students
a.span: Families wishing to enroll new students into the district may do so online from home, at the school building or at the Engagement Center located at 10 N.Main Street during normal business hours

a.title: CCAA
a.span: College & Career Academies of Akron will transform the traditional high school experience into an innovative model that prepares all students for life, linking academic subjects to college majors and career sectors

div.div: During this time of academic uncertainty, students and families are faced with a diversity of daily challenges. Their new normal consists of remote learning opportunities with limited interactions to teachers and peers that help guide students’ educational success.

div.span: Read More About Connecting With Connectors

a.title: Send Postcards to Local Grocery Stores

img.alt: Send Postcards to Local Grocery Stores

div.div: Send Postcards to Local Grocery Stores

Akron Children's Museum is inviting community members to join in an effort to thank local grocery store associates, front-line workers and customers at local Acme Fresh Markets during April, National Poetry Month.

div.span: Read More About Send Postcards to Local Grocery Stores

a.title: Three Ellet Students Pass EMT Exam

img.alt: Three Ellet Students Pass EMT Exam

div.div: Three Ellet Students Pass EMT Exam

In the fall of 2019, Brandon Schoborg, director of Paramedic Education and Cleveland Clinic Akron General and advisory board member at Ellet CLC, proposed an opportunity for Ellet Fire Safety Pathway senior students to participate in Emergency Medical Technician (EMT) training.

div.span: Read More About Three Ellet Students Pass EMT Exam
